function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of waste management in building and construction projects","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases due to unhygienic conditions and waste accumulation","Mitigation":"Implementing effective waste management plans, regular cleaning and disinfection of construction sites","Technologies":"Waste tracking and management software, automated waste segregation systems","People":"Construction workers, nearby residents, visitors to the construction site","Owner":"Construction companies, city municipalities, waste management companies"},{"Description":"Inefficient deconstruction and demolition processes","Impact":"Potential exposure to hazardous materials and pathogens during deconstruction and demolition activities","Mitigation":"Proper training and equipment for workers, safe handling and disposal of hazardous materials, regular health monitoring of workers","Technologies":"Demolition robots, remote-operated demolition equipment, asbestos detection and removal devices","People":"Construction workers, demolition workers, nearby residents","Owner":"Construction companies, demolition companies, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of proper material recovery and reuse practices","Impact":"Increased generation of construction waste and disposal in landfills, leading to environmental pollution and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Promoting material recovery and reuse, implementing circular economy principles, improving building design for deconstruction and reusability","Technologies":"Building Information Modeling (BIM), advanced recycling and material recovery technologies, sustainable construction materials","People":"Construction industry professionals, waste management companies, environmental organizations","Owner":"Architects, engineers, construction companies, government agencies"}]}
